name: userstyles.org - Show Install Count & Rating
description:
Yet another "Show Total and Weekly Install Count"(by Barbiegirl)
http://userstyles.org/styles/21039
 
 
********** Change from the original **********
 - Moved: ":hover" pseudo-class to normal-class.
 - Changed: "T" means total install count, "W" means weekly install count, and "R" means rating.
 - Changed: Better font color.
 - Changed: Padding instead of margin.
